content.query:
drop external data source ExternalDataSource
go
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [fs] WITH
(
	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/devs.csv'
)
-- url https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs
-- endpoint https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/
go 

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT skipHeader_CSV
WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
          FIRST_ROW = 2, 
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True)
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cetasDevs
(
    [first] varchar(50),
    [last] varchar(50)
)  
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'devs.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = skipHeader_CSV
)
GO

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM cetasDevs
